title: Comparative efficacy of sweated and non-sweated Salvia miltiorrhiza Bge. extracts on acute myocardial ischemia via regulating the PPARα/RXRα/NF-κB signaling pathway
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Xiaoxiao Shan, Junying Li, Bangzhen Hong, Huihui Yin, Ziyi Lu, Guokai Wang, Nianjun Yu, Daiyin Peng, Lei Wang, Caiyun Zhang, Weidong Chen
